ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] What does this mean????
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Someone may have answered already but I just got over 200 emails-- my server s modem got fried a couple days ago and my power has been out. I went into
ygData.messageBody:
> Hi again everyone!
>
> Yesterday I was playing Genmay, my Gnome Warrior and I'm using a
> mace as my weapon. I kept getting a message saying something like my
> will isn't right to command this weapon. What does that mean? That I'm
> not able to use it or more specifically my class doesn't wield this
> weapon as well as others? Heck I seemed to be kicking some butt with it
> as my hits were ranking between 12-16 points each. Any ideas?
>
Someone may have answered already but I just got over 200 emails-- my
server's modem got fried a couple days ago and my power has been out. I went
into total withdrawal without electricity!
The thing about your will is that the effect of the weapon (in the
description it says Effect and maybe something like Velium Shards) will not
work until you are a higher level. It's called proccing. Your weapon will
proc when you get higher level.
luv,
-Su
